title: Sorry Seems To Be The Hardest Word
lyrics:
[intro, 2 strum each]
| (Gm7)  (Gm6)  (Eb)  (D) |
| (Eb)  (Eb)  (Dsus4)  (D) |
 
(Gm) What I gotta do to make you (Cm)love me?
(F) What I gotta do to make you (Bb)care?
(Gm) What do I do when lightnin' (Cm)strikes me?
(F) And I wake to find that you're not (Bb)there
 
(Gm) What I gotta do to make you (Cm)want me?
(F) What I gotta do to be (Bb)heard?
(Gm) What do I say when it's all (Cm)over?
And (F)sorry seems to be the hardest (Bb)word (F)
 
[chorus]
(Eb) It's sad, (D7) so sad
(Gm7) It's a sad sad (C)situation
(Eb) And it's gettin' (D)more and more ab(Gm)surd
(Eb) It's sad, (D7) so sad
(Gm7) Why can't we (C)talk it over?
(Eb) Oh, it seems to (Eb)me
(D)That (Eb)sorry seems to (D)be the hardest (Gm)word
 
(Gm) What I gotta do to make you (Cm)want me?
(F) What I gotta do to be (Bb)heard?
(Gm) What do I say when it's all (Cm)over?
And (F)sorry seems to be the hardest (Bb)word (F)
 
[chorus]
(Eb) It's sad, (D7) so sad
(Gm7) It's a sad sad (C)situation
(Eb) And it's gettin' (D)more and more ab(Gm)surd
(Eb) It's sad, (D7) so sad
(Gm7) Why can't we (C)talk it over?
(Eb) Oh, it seems to (Eb)me
(D)That (Eb)sorry seems to (D)be the hardest (Gm)word
 
[interlude, kazoo]
| (Gm)  (Cm)  (F)  (Bb) |
| (Gm)  (Cm)  (F)  (Bb)Sooo(Dsus4)or(D)ry |
 
(Gm) What I gotta do to make you (Cm)love me?
(F) What I gotta do to be (Bb)heard?
(Gm) What do I do when lightnin' (Cm)strikes me?
(Eb)What have I gotta (D7)do?
(Gm)What have I gotta (Cm)do?
When (Eb)sorry seems to (D7) be... the hardest word?
[outro]
| (Gm7)  (Gm6)  (Eb)  (D) |
| (Eb)  (Eb)  (Dsus4)  (D) |
(Gm) [end]
